title.rendered: Alvarium appoints Peter Golovsky as Managing Director, Head of Family Office Services for Asia-Pacific

excerpt.rendered: Peter Golovsky joins Alvarium from investor services provider IQ-EQ, where he was head of private wealth for Asia, based in Hong Kong. He was previously the global head of fiduciary services head and head of Asia role at an international legal, accounting and fiduciary services firm, and spent 10 years in private banking, with senior roles at Macquarie and Westpac.
